entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
